name: Evening Desert Safari with BBQ Dinner
description: Evening Desert Safari Dubai is a mandatory experience that one must take while touring Dubai. If you are deprived from visiting desert then this is the best opportunity to have a wonderful experience in the middle of golden desert. One must attend this safari tour and taste the delicious B.B.Q dinner. You will have a real life thrill here and feel that this is the rarest experience that you have ever had in your whole life.  The splendor of the Desert begins with the scenic beauty of your own lenses.  The picturesqueness of the Evening Desert Safari will imprint a hallmark upon your mind. This is a delight for the nature lovers to have a look of the live sunset on the horizon. It will give fun to those people who have a real craze for capturing the beauty.
